Country.GetList: select cntr.Id as CountryId, cntr.Name as CountryName, ct.Id as CityId, ct.Name as CityName, a.Id as AirportId, a.Name as AirportName from Countries cntr inner join Cities ct on ct.CountryId = cntr.Id inner join Airports a on a.CityId = ct.Id
